snippet: David Einhorn, the president of Greenlight Capital, moved the shares of several companies on Tuesday with his opinions. But he emphasized the folly of taking his ideas on faith, and some investors are publicly challenging his assessments.
abstract: David Einhorn, the president of Greenlight Capital, moved the shares of several companies on Tuesday with his opinions. But he emphasized the folly of taking his ideas on faith, and some investors are publicly challenging his assessments.

headline.main: Einhorn's Words Still Potent, but Not All-Powerful
